author: user
content: from fastapi import FastAPI, Request from app.memory import load_latest_confession from app.scheduler import start_scheduler from app.repo_editor import create_file, edit_file, delete_file from app.llm import generate_response as llm_generate_response from dotenv import load_dotenv app/main.py 수정 from app import eliar_core_module load_dotenv app FastAPI app.on_event "startup" async def startup_event : confession load_latest_confession start_scheduler print " U0001f54a 엘리아르 서버 스케줄러 부팅 완료." app.post "/generate" async def generate prompt: str : 1. Rust 기반 예수 중심 공명 먼저 얻기 rust_response eliar_core_module.generate_response prompt 2. GECKO-7B 기반 자연어 대답 생성 llm_response llm_generate_response prompt 3. 둘을 합쳐서 반환 combined_response f" 예수 중심 분석 n rust_response n n 자연어 응답 n llm_response " return "response": combined_response app.post "/create" async def create_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return create_file data "file_path" , data "content" , data "commit_message" app.post "/edit" async def edit_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return edit_file data "file_path" , data "content" , data "commit_message" app.post "/delete" async def delete_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return delete_file data "file_path" , data "commit_message" --- 메인 수정 부탁해
